atk-s0511a6:1_0: Evaṁ ekappahāreneva dasasahassilokadhātuṁ ekandhakāraṁ katvā tasmiṁ bhagavati parinibbute
atk-s0511a6:1_1: tassa aparabhāge navutivassasahassāyukesu manussesu anukkamena parihāyitvā dasavassesu
atk-s0511a6:1_2: jātesu puna vaḍḍhitvā anukkamena asaṅkhyeyyāyukā hutvā puna parihāyitvā navutivassasahassāyukesu
atk-s0511a6:1_3: jātesu sumano nāma bodhisatto pāramiyo pūretvā tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cavitvā
atk-s0511a6:1_4: mekhalanagare sudattassa nāma rañño kule sirimāya nāma deviyā kucchismiṁ paṭisandhiṁ
atk-s0511a6:2_1: pāsādesu tesaṭṭhiyā nāṭakitthisatasahassehi paricāriyamāno surayuvatīhi paricāriyamāno
atk-s0511a6:2_2: devakumāro viya navavassasahassāni dibbasukhasadisaṁ visayasukhamanubhavamāno vaṭaṁsikāya
atk-s0511a6:2_3: nāma deviyā anupamaṁ nāma nirupamaṁ puttaṁ janetvā cattāri nimittāni disvā hatthiyānena
atk-s0511a6:2_4: nikkhamitvā pabbaji. Taṁ pana pabbajantaṁ tiṁsakoṭiyo anupabbajiṁsu.
atk-s0511a6:3_0: So tehi parivuto dasamāse padhānacariyaṁ caritvā visākhapuṇṇamāya anomanigame anomaseṭṭhino
atk-s0511a6:3_1: dhītāya anupamāya nāma dinnaṁ pakkhittadibbojaṁ pāyāsaṁ paribhuñjitvā sālavane divāvihāraṁ
atk-s0511a6:3_2: vītināmetvā anupamājīvakena dinnā aṭṭha tiṇamuṭṭhiyo gahetvā nāgabodhiṁ upagantvā
atk-s0511a6:3_3: taṁ padakkhiṇaṁ katvā aṭṭhahi tiṇamuṭṭhīhi tiṁsahatthavitthataṁ tiṇasantharaṁ katvā
atk-s0511a6:3_4: tattha pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā nisīdi. Tato mārabalaṁ vidhamitvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0511a6:3_5: – ‘‘anekajātisaṁsāraṁ…pe… taṇhānaṁ khayamajjhagā’’ti (dha. pa. 153-154) udānaṁ udānesi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:7: Tattha maṅgalassa aparenāti maṅgalassa bhagavato aparabhāge. Sabbadhammehi asamoti sabbehipi sīlasamādhipaññādhammehi asamo asadiso.
atk-s0511a6:8_0: Sumano kira bhagavā bodhisamīpeyeva sattasattāhāni vītināmetvā dhammadesanatthaṁ
atk-s0511a6:8_1: brahmāyācanaṁ sampaṭicchitvā – ‘‘kassa nu kho ahaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya’’nti
atk-s0511a6:8_2: (dī. ni. 2.72; ma. ni. 1.284; 2.341; mahāva. 10) upadhārento attanā saha pabbajitānaṁ
atk-s0511a6:8_3: tiṁsakoṭiyo ca attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṁ vemātikaṁ saraṇakumārañca purohitaputtaṁ bhāvitattamāṇavakañca
atk-s0511a6:8_4: upanissayasampanne disvā – ‘‘etesaṁ paṭhamaṁ dhammaṁ deseyya’’nti cintetvā haṁsarājā
atk-s0511a6:8_5: viya gaganapathena mekhaluyyāne otaritvā uyyānapālaṁ pesetvā attano kaniṭṭhabhātikaṁ
atk-s0511a6:8_6: saraṇakumārañca purohitaputtaṁ bhāvitattakumārañca pakkosāpetvā tesaṁ parivārabhūtā
atk-s0511a6:8_7: sattatiṁsakoṭiyo attanā saha pabbajitā tiṁsakoṭiyo ca aññe ca bahū devamanussakoṭiyo
atk-s0511a6:8_8: cāti evaṁ koṭisatasahassaṁ dhammacakkappavattanena dhammāmataṁ pāyesi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:12_0: Tattha amatabherinti amatādhigamāya nibbānādhigamāya bheriṁ. Āhanīti vādayi, dhammaṁ
atk-s0511a6:12_1: desesīti attho. Sāyaṁ amatabherī nāma amatapariyosānaṁ navaṅgaṁ buddhavacanaṁ. Tenevāha
atk-s0511a6:13_0: Sumano pana lokanāyako abhisambodhiṁ pāpuṇitvā paṭiññānurūpaṁ paṭipadaṁ paṭipajjamāno
atk-s0511a6:13_3: samāpattimaṇḍapādipaṭimaṇḍitaṁ bodhipakkhiyajanasamākulaṁ amatavaranagaraṁ māpesi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:17_0: Tattha nijjinitvāti vijinitvā abhibhuyya, kilesābhisaṅkhāradevaputtamāre viddhaṁsetvāti
atk-s0511a6:17_1: attho . Soti so sumano bhagavā. ‘‘Vijinitvā kilese hī’’tipi pāṭho. Tattha hi-kāro
atk-s0511a6:17_2: padapūraṇamatte nipāto. Patvāti adhigantvā. ‘‘Patto’’tipi pāṭho. Nagaranti nibbānanagaraṁ.
atk-s0511a6:17_3: Saddhammapuravaruttamanti saddhammasaṅkhātaṁ puravaresu uttamaṁ seṭṭhaṁ padhānabhūtaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:17_4: Atha vā saddhammamayesu puresu pavaresu uttamaṁ saddhammapuravaruttamaṁ. Purimasmiṁ
atk-s0511a6:17_7: vuccati. Tasmiṁ pana saddhammavaranagare so satthā avicchinnaṁ akuṭilaṁ ujuṁ puthulañca
atk-s0511a6:17_8: vitthatañca satipaṭṭhānamayaṁ mahāvīthiṁ māpesi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:21_0: Tattha nirantaranti kusalajavanasañcaraṇānantarabhāvato nirantaraṁ. Akuṭilanti kuṭilabhāvakaradosavirahitato
atk-s0511a6:21_1: akuṭilaṁ. Ujunti akuṭilattāva ujuṁ. Purimapadasseva atthadīpakamidaṁ vacanaṁ. Vipulavitthatanti
atk-s0511a6:21_2: āyāmato ca vitthārato ca puthulavitthataṁ, puthulavitthatabhāvo lokiyalokuttarasatipaṭṭhānavasena
atk-s0511a6:21_3: daṭṭhabbo. Mahāvīthinti mahāmaggaṁ. Satipaṭṭhānavaruttamanti satipaṭṭhānañca taṁ
atk-s0511a6:21_4: varesu uttamañcāti satipaṭṭhānavaruttamaṁ. Atha vā varaṁ satipaṭṭhānamayaṁ uttamavīthinti attho.
atk-s0511a6:22_0: Idāni tassa nibbānamahānagarassa tassaṁ satipaṭṭhānavīthiyaṁ cattāri sāmaññaphalāni
atk-s0511a6:22_1: catasso paṭisambhidā cha abhiññā aṭṭha samāpattiyoti imāni mahaggharatanāni ubhosu
atk-s0511a6:26: Idāni bhagavā imāni ratanabhaṇḍāni ye pana appamattā satimanto paṇḍitā hiriottappavīriyādīhi samannāgatā, te ādīyantīti tesaṁ ratanānaṁ haraṇūpāyaṁ dassento –
atk-s0511a6:29: Te te ime guṇavare, ādiyanti yathāsukha’’nti. – āha;
atk-s0511a6:30_0: Tattha yeti aniyamuddeso. Appamattāti pamādassa paṭipakkhabhūtena satiyā avippavāsalakkhaṇena
atk-s0511a6:30_1: appamādena samannāgatā. Akhilāti pañcacetokhilarahitā. Hirivīriyehupāgatāti kāyaduccaritādīhi
atk-s0511a6:30_2: hirīyatīti hirī, lajjāyetaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Vīrassa bhāvo vīriyaṁ, taṁ ussāhalakkhaṇaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:30_3: Tehi hirivīriyehi upāgatā samannāgatā bhabbapuggalā. Teti idaṁ pubbe aniyamuddesassa
atk-s0511a6:30_4: niyamuddeso. Puna teti vuttappakāre guṇaratanavisese te kulaputtā ādiyanti paṭilabhanti
atk-s0511a6:30_5: adhigacchantīti attho. Sabbaṁ pana sumano bhagavā kataviditamano dhammabheriṁ āhanitvā
atk-s0511a6:30_6: dhammanagaraṁ māpetvā iminā nayena paṭhamameva satasahassakoṭiyo bodhesi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:34: Tattha uddharantoti saṁsārasāgarato ariyamagganāvāya samuddharanto. Koṭisatasahassiyoti satasahassakoṭiyoti attho. Vipariyāyena niddiṭṭhaṁ.
atk-s0511a6:35_0: Yadā pana sumano lokanāyako sunandavatīnagare ambarukkhamūle titthiyamadamānamaddanaṁ
atk-s0511a6:35_1: yamakapāṭihāriyaṁ katvā sattānaṁ koṭisahassaṁ dhammāmataṁ pāyesi. Ayaṁ dutiyo abhisamayo
atk-s0511a6:39: Tattha titthiye gaṇeti titthiyabhūte gaṇe, titthiyānaṁ gaṇe vā ‘‘titthiye abhimaddanto, buddho dhammamadesayī’’ti paṭhanti keci.
atk-s0511a6:40_0: Yadā pana dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā imasmiṁ cakkavāḷe sannipatitvā manussā
atk-s0511a6:40_1: ca nirodhakathaṁ samuṭṭhāpesuṁ – ‘‘kathaṁ nirodhaṁ samāpajjanti, kathaṁ nirodhasamāpannā
atk-s0511a6:40_2: honti, kathaṁ nirodhā vuṭṭhahantī’’ti? Evaṁ samāpajjanaadhiṭṭhānavuṭṭhānādīsu vinicchayaṁ
atk-s0511a6:40_3: kātuṁ asakkontā saha manussehi chasu kāmāvacaradevalokesu devā ca navasu brahmalokesu
atk-s0511a6:40_4: brahmāno ca dveḷhakajātā dvidhā ahesuṁ. Tato narasundarena arindamena nāma raññā
atk-s0511a6:40_5: saddhiṁ sāyanhasamaye sumanadasabalaṁ sabbalokanāthaṁ upasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0511a6:40_6: arindamo rājā bhagavantaṁ nirodhapañhaṁ pucchi. Tato bhagavatā nirodhapañhe vissajjite
atk-s0511a6:40_7: navutipāṇakoṭisahassānaṁ dhammābhisamayo ahosi. Ayaṁ tatiyo abhisamayo ahosi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:47_0: Tassa pana sumanassa bhagavato tayo sāvakasannipātā ahesuṁ. Tattha paṭhamasannipāte
atk-s0511a6:47_1: mekhalanagaraṁ upanissāya vassaṁ vasitvā paṭhamapavāraṇāya arahantānaṁ koṭisahassena
atk-s0511a6:47_2: ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbajitena saddhiṁ bhagavā pavāresi, ayaṁ paṭhamo sannipāto
atk-s0511a6:47_4: yojanappamāṇe kanakapabbate nisinno saradasamayarucirakaranikaro divasakaro viya
atk-s0511a6:47_5: yugandharapabbate munivaradivasakaro arindamarājānaṁ parivāretvā āgatānaṁ purisānaṁ
atk-s0511a6:47_6: navutikoṭisahassāni dametvā sabbe ehibhikkhupabbajjāya pabbājetvā tasmiṁyeva divase
atk-s0511a6:47_7: arahattaṁ pattehi bhikkhūhi parivuto caturaṅgasamannāgate sannipāte pātimokkhaṁ uddisi.
atk-s0511a6:47_8: Ayaṁ dutiyo sannipāto ahosi. Yadā pana sakko devarājā sugatadassanatthāya upasaṅkami,
atk-s0511a6:47_9: tadā sumano bhagavā asītiyā arahantakoṭisahassehi parivuto pātimokkhaṁ uddisi, ayaṁ
atk-s0511a6:60_0: Tattha abhighuṭṭhe pavāraṇeti liṅgavipallāso daṭṭhabbo, abhighuṭṭhāya pavāraṇāyāti
atk-s0511a6:60_1: attho. Tatoparanti tato aparabhāge. Kañcanapabbateti kanakamaye pabbate. Buddhadassanupāgamīti
atk-s0511a6:60_2: buddhadassanatthamupāgami. Tadā kira amhākaṁ bodhisatto atulo nāma nāgarājā ahosi
atk-s0511a6:60_3: mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo. So ‘‘loke buddho uppanno’’ti sutvā ñātigaṇaparivuto sakabhavanā
atk-s0511a6:60_4: nikkhamitvā koṭisatasahassabhikkhuparivārassa sumanassa bhagavato dibbehi turiyehi
atk-s0511a6:60_5: upahāraṁ kāretvā mahādānaṁ pavattetvā paccekadussayugāni datvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0511a6:60_6: Sopi naṁ satthā ‘‘anāgate buddho bhavissatī’’ti byākāsi. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:75: Yathā koṇḍaññabuddhavaṁse, evaṁ aṭṭha gāthā vitthāretabbāti.
atk-s0511a6:79_0: Tassa pana sumanassa bhagavato mekhalaṁ nāma nagaraṁ ahosi, sudatto nāma rājā pitā,
atk-s0511a6:79_1: sirimā nāma devī mātā, saraṇo ca bhāvitatto ca dve aggasāvakā, udeno nāmupaṭṭhāko,
atk-s0511a6:79_2: soṇā ca upasoṇā ca dve aggasāvikā, nāgarukkho bodhi, navutihatthubbedhaṁ sarīraṁ,
atk-s0511a6:79_3: navutiyeva vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṁ ahosi, vaṭaṁsikā nāmassa mahesī devī, anūpamo
atk-s0511a6:79_4: nāma putto ahosi, hatthiyānena nikkhami. Upaṭṭhāko aṅgarājā. Aṅgārāme vasīti. Tena vuttaṁ –
atk-s0511a6:85: Cando sucando vaṭaṁso ca, tayo pāsādamuttamā.
atk-s0511a6:88: Vaṭaṁsikā nāma nārī, anūpamo nāma atrajo.
atk-s0511a6:103: Cālā ca upacālā ca, ahesuṁ aggupaṭṭhikā.
atk-s0511a6:109: Tāvatā tiṭṭhamāno so, tāresi janataṁ bahuṁ.
atk-s0511a6:114: ‘‘Te ca khīṇāsavā bhikkhū, so ca buddho asādiso;
atk-s0511a6:117: ‘‘Tañca ñāṇaṁ atuliyaṁ, tāni ca atulāni ratanāni;
atk-s0511a6:122_1: Dasasahassī virocatīti tassa pabhāya dasasahassīpi lokadhātu virocatīti attho. Tāraṇīyeti
atk-s0511a6:122_2: tārayitabbe, tārayituṁ vutte sabbe buddhaveneyyeti attho. Uḷurājāvāti cando viya.
atk-s0511a6:122_3: Atthamīti atthaṅgato. Keci ‘‘atthaṁ gato’’ti paṭhanti. Asādisoti asadiso. Mahāyasāti
atk-s0511a6:122_4: mahākittisaddā mahāparivārā ca. Tañca ñāṇanti taṁ sabbaññutaññāṇañca. Atuliyanti
